name: eventTimestamp
description: Timestamp indicating when the event was recorded.

name: src
description: Source from which the event metric was recorded.

name: eventType
description: Type of event that was recorded.

name: eventDetail
description: Specific details associated with the recorded event.

name: newsletterId
description: Identifier of the newsletter, typically for web application contexts.

name: recipientHash
description: Hash string representing the recipient of the newsletter.

name: url
description: Link associated with a headline within the newsletter, if clicked.

name: durationSec
description: Duration of time spent on the web application, measured in seconds.

name: userAgent
description: Browser details of the user who viewed the newsletter content.
